scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Nomou' (Let's Drink) by hololive ID 2nd Generation.
MC section where the members introduce themselves and discuss the features of their 3D stage.
Introduction and start of the song 'Tsugihagi Staccato' by Kureiji Ollie and Anya Melfissa.

subtitles.original: 飲もう
subtitles.english: Let's drink

subtitles.original: ライ ライ ライ
subtitles.english: Rai rai rai

subtitles.original: Hey DJ
subtitles.english: Hey DJ

subtitles.original: カマセ yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: Bring it on, yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: Bersama-sama!
subtitles.english: All together now!

subtitles.original: Kibun jojo!
subtitles.english: Feeling great!

subtitles.original: Aduh, cape jadi pengen sexy stretching.
subtitles.english: Man, I'm tired. I feel like doing some sexy stretching.

subtitles.original: Jadi, hari ini kita di sini mau ngapain?
subtitles.english: So, what are we all doing here today?

subtitles.original: Hari ini kita akan...
subtitles.english: Today, we're going to have...

subtitles.original: MINI LIVE!
subtitles.english: A MINI LIVE!

subtitles.original: Holoro semuanya udah berkumpul ya teman-teman.
subtitles.english: All of Holoro has gathered here, everyone.

subtitles.original: Habis ini kita akan nyanyi lebih banyak lagi.
subtitles.english: After this, we'll be singing even more.

subtitles.original: Terus masih ada banyak lagi yang pengen kita perlihatkan.
subtitles.english: And there's still so much more we want to show you.

subtitles.original: Pokoknya bukan cuma lagu doang, nggak sih? Ada banyak deh.
subtitles.english: It's not just songs, you know? There's a lot.

subtitles.original: Oke kalau gitu, perkenalkan diri dulu nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Okay then, shouldn't we introduce ourselves first?

subtitles.original: Ooh iya, bener bener bener.
subtitles.english: Oh right, true, true, true.

subtitles.original: Oke dari aku kalau gitu.
subtitles.english: Okay, I'll go first then.

subtitles.original: Halo semuanya, aku Anya Melfissa...
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, I'm Anya Melfissa...

subtitles.original: ...dari hololive ID Generasi 2, Holoro!
subtitles.english: ...from hololive ID 2nd Generation, Holoro!

subtitles.original: Dan guys, jangan lupa ya pakai hashtagnya.
subtitles.english: And guys, don't forget to use the hashtag.

subtitles.original: Hashtag Holoroshow dan dipost ke social media.
subtitles.english: #holoroshow, and post it to social media.

subtitles.original: Kita tunggu loh pesan-pesannya.
subtitles.english: We'll be waiting for your messages!

subtitles.original: Oke kalau gitu, dari Reine perkenalkan diri.
subtitles.english: Okay then, Reine, please introduce yourself.

subtitles.original: Oke, aku Reine, Resident bagian...
subtitles.english: Okay, I'm Reine, the Resident...

subtitles.original: ...Tante Sexy Stretching dari hololive ID Generasi 2, Holoro!
subtitles.english: ...'Auntie' of Sexy Stretching from hololive ID Gen 2, Holoro!

subtitles.original: Aduh Ibu... Ibu aku pulang!
subtitles.english: Oh, Mother... Mother, I'm home!

subtitles.original: Aduh! Suaranya mirip kayak ibu kos yang aku tempatin dulu.
subtitles.english: Man! Her voice sounds like my old landlady's.

subtitles.original: Oke next nggak sih? Ollie? Terakhir aku.
subtitles.english: Okay, next? Ollie? Lastly, me.

subtitles.original: Zombalas! Hebat Kawaii Zombie Idol!
subtitles.english: Zombalas! The Great Kawaii Zombie Idol!

subtitles.original: K-K-K-K-K-K-Crazy Ollie desu!
subtitles.english: C-C-C-C-C-C-Crazy Ollie!

subtitles.original: Btw, kalian tahu nggak ini kita sekarang lagi di mana?
subtitles.english: Btw, do you guys know where we are right now?

subtitles.original: Kayaknya familiar nggak sih?
subtitles.english: It looks familiar, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: Masa nggak tahu? Kalau lihat 3D showcase yang lain...
subtitles.english: How could you not know? If you've seen other 3D showcases...

subtitles.original: ...masa nggak tahu ini kita di mana sekarang?
subtitles.english: ...how could you not know where we are now?

subtitles.original: Jawabannya adalah...
subtitles.english: The answer is...

subtitles.original: HOLO ID STAGE!
subtitles.english: THE HOLO ID STAGE!

subtitles.original: Seperti kalian bisa lihat, ini adalah Holo ID Stage.
subtitles.english: As you can see, this is the Holo ID Stage.

subtitles.original: Ini sempat direnovasi kan ya biar kayak tema kita gitu.
subtitles.english: It was renovated to match our theme.

subtitles.original: Oke stagenya Anya diapain?
subtitles.english: Okay, what happened to Anya's stage?

subtitles.original: Ooh ya, di stage aku, ini lantainya pasir guys.
subtitles.english: Oh right, for my stage, the floor is sand, guys.

subtitles.original: Terus banyak pedang, banyak tembakan...
subtitles.english: And there are lots of swords, lots of guns...

subtitles.original: ...pokoknya agak berbahaya untuk ngedance di sana.
subtitles.english: ...basically, it's a bit dangerous to dance there.

subtitles.original: Kemarin aku juga sebenarnya agak berbahaya.
subtitles.english: Yesterday was actually a bit dangerous for me too.

subtitles.original: Tapi nggak ada yang bahaya untukku karena aku Keris Sakti!
subtitles.english: But nothing is dangerous for me because I'm a Magic Keris!

subtitles.original: Kalau punya kamu gimana?
subtitles.english: What about yours?

subtitles.original: Kalau di tempatnya Ollie ada banyak pudding gitu loh.
subtitles.english: At Ollie's place, there's a lot of pudding.

subtitles.original: Kalau di Reine ada apa deh?
subtitles.english: What about Reine's place?

subtitles.original: Aku banyak burung merak, terus ada gedung-gedung.
subtitles.english: I have lots of peacocks and buildings.

subtitles.original: Di bawah lantainya ini juga lantai merak.
subtitles.english: And the floor here is also a peacock floor.

subtitles.original: Hebat ya stage bisa langsung ganti-ganti.
subtitles.english: It's amazing how the stage can change instantly.

subtitles.original: Tapi ya udah kalau gitu sekarang kita ada yang lain dong.
subtitles.english: But anyway, we have something else now.

subtitles.original: Makanya tonton sampai akhir ya!
subtitles.english: So make sure to watch until the end!

subtitles.original: Saatnya kita ke live show! Live-nya berlanjut!
subtitles.english: Time to go to the live show! The live continues!

subtitles.original: Mari kita switch stage!
subtitles.english: Let's switch stages!

subtitles.original: ツギハギスタッカート
subtitles.english: Tsugihagi Staccato

subtitles.original: ツギハギだらけの君との時間もそろそろ
subtitles.english: Our time together, full of patches, will soon be over
